ModMetaData.name: LMC006.更多的家具
ModMetaData.author: Anonemous2
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 添加了一堆家具，有一个单独的选项卡存放（更多家具）。包括花盆、床头柜、茶几、椅子、桌子、照明用具、地毯、文件柜、梳妆台等，其中一部分在图片中展示，剩余的因为比较懒就没全部弄出来了，请在游戏中自行体验。 More Furniture, does what you'd expect, it adds more furniture. Was originally created so I'd have stuff to put inside my colonist's rooms, but It now includes several items for other uses. There may be occasional updates adding new items into the mod. More Furniture is old save compatible and does not require any other mods to work. Contains: New End tables/with or without lamps A new Dresser New Chairs, and a modular couch A tiny table Counter tops New plant pots/some with art A filling cabinet Four new carpet to match beds You can find these new items under the Furniture+ when placing blueprints. (1.0.1)
